name: Colorful Clix
description:
Just download it immediately without any hesitation!!!
Let the refreshing game Colorful Clix™ bring more joy to your life!
It is the perfect edge tool to kill time developed by TINOME.
* Specifically designed for those fans who deeply love PUZZLE!
* Support 10 fingers to play the game at the same time. (how to hold ?! ^.^ )
* Support 2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10 friends to play this multiplayer game together, just like playing competition,awesome!
* With high quality graphics and background music of HIFI level, wow, it couldn't be more fantastic and more wonderful!
* Absolutely matched for New iPad and iPhone4S , please don't bury the good equipment , just give her a chance to show the excellent quality and performance!
